title: New mode Idea: Rebirth
body: It is very simple.  Every time you die you resurrect as a random champion.

replies.body:
You should keep the items you bought as that's part of the randomness. If they don't fit with your new champ just die again, if you think the RNG gods will bless you kindly. 


Or if people do not like that idea pick a role like Marksmen and only get champs that are considered marksmen or something
I think this would be awesome,  as long as you pick a role and resurrect as a champion who fits that role, like you said.
That sounds fun. What about builds, though?

Well couple of options on that really. 
1. it stays the same
2. get equivalent gold
3. you get the recommended items in equivalent gold.
4. it is completely random items based on gold earned

How about all hybrid items?
Maybe:
Gunblade
Rabadon's
Infinity Edge
Deathfire Grasp
Blade of the Ruined
Orange Mobility boots

Cool idea, but OP has obviously never done programming before.


The lag would be INSANE, and loading would take literally 12x as long.

I've always wondered how programming fairs in the sack.

Can you explain why load and lag would increase? Those related assets could be loaded during death timers no? I mean you're only loading the initial champions pregame and loading them while the game is active.
Love it! also make it so that if you have the champion it chooses a random skin.

I remember when I played DotA on WC3 there was kind of such a mode... there was a mode where when you died you picked/got a new champion and you got as much gold as you had (with your items refunded) and when there were no more Ancients or Scourge champions/heroes left (or whatever the teams are called)... well then you were out...
Well I think I remember such a thing...
everytime u die, you gain 10% damage, hp, armor and mr buff that stacks
That would make the game take too long to finish, since everytime you die you get stronger.
I feel like I should just go in with blank runes and masteries haha
This would be awesome as an ARAM mode. More kills/deaths=More randomness
LOVE this idea, it's just the builds I'm wondering about. And the loading time. But it WOULD be interesting.
The game load under 10 champion model. A 120 model load would take 12 times as much if not more. It would be a HUGE cpu drainage. No way that this is possible without excluding 40% or more of players

Actually they could limit it to randomly becoming one of the 10 selected champions.  So when you die you either become the same champion or a copy of one of the other nice chosen champs.  This would drastically limit the data needed to load and gives it more strategy.

Dota 2 already has this mode.

Not necessarily new (Well maybe new to LoL).
